entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Table-specific facet configuration with TPT results in wrong column names with SQLite #33955
  • Nested transactions throw an exception #33954
  • Non-generic ValueComparer and ValueConverter #33952
  • Sqlite: "target object/alias may not appear in FROM clause" in ExecuteUpdate #33947
    Backlog
  • Remove unneeded query root table when it's not needed in the query #33946
    Backlog
  • `builder.Entity<>().Property().Metadata.SetAfterSaveBehavior()` cannot be used with `.HasOne()` on the same prop #33945

Closed

  • Unexpected Client Evaluation when joining List and DbSet #33953
  • Missing checks for predicate when simplifying JSON primitive collections #33932
  • No relational provider - Entity annotation with default value based on DdContext property #33950
  • Hashset contains becomes a traditional IN statement instead of the new OpenJSON parameter #32365
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix UpdateExpression.VisitChildren to visit the setter column #33948
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #33944
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Add missing check for predicate in primitive collection simplifications #33939
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.7
  • Implement translation of HashSet<T> (and ICollection<T> in general) to OPENJSON query #33920

Updated

  • Remove optimization of `NOT(a != b)` #33943
